extendedInfo.description: ** FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME !! ** MyGPA - GPA Calculator is a powerful, easy to use grade tracking tool. It will help track your school progress giving you an accurate calculation of your current grade. In addition, it will also calculate the best and worst case scenario based on your remaining assignments.It is excellent for usage throughout a student's academic career to monitor their current progress. With the best and worst case grade calculation engine, students can see what is the maximum and minimum grade they can achieve. With this information at hand, students can determine how to manage their time better to maximize their GPA.Features:- Track your academic progress from academic career, academic year, term, course, grade group, and marks- Calculates your best case and worst case grades  (percentage, GPA, letter grade)- Fully customizable grade schemes to map percentage ranges to leter grades and GPA- Pre-configured with common grade schemes from several Universities plus other generic schemes- Intuitive easy to use user interface- Fully integrated to android menu and context menu for easy to use navigation- Central dashboard to quickly access features of the application - Quick, accurate calculation engineMyGPA Lite Version is also available at:https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dtam.mygpa.liteKeywords: gpa calculator gpa school gpa score gpa academic percentage gpa grade point average gpa course gpa term semester gpa calculation gpa transcript gpa exam gpa letter grade gpa university gpa college gpa mark gpa A+ gpa success gpa student gpa test gpa percent gpa

reviews.title: Ripoff!
reviews.comment: This app is just a straight ripoff of GradeWizard with minimal changes. Do not support this app!
reviews.author: Clarence Simpson

reviews.title: Great Function; careless error
reviews.comment: Works great and I don\'t see any limitations that bother me. However, there is one typo that is really bothering me - it\'s spelled \"guaranteed\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I love this app. Its easy to see what my grades are/will be in a class and my GPA for the semester. I love the fact that you can change the grading scale also; it\'s so convenient. Thanks for this!
reviews.author: Samaria Mitchell

reviews.title: Ready good!
reviews.comment: Very useful! Can be changed to your own situation, so it can be used by anyone, anywhere!
reviews.author: Felipe Martins

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Rip off or not, it works,it helps me a lot, and i appreciate this app. Thank you.
reviews.author: ilan ilizarov
